Antenatal care
6
Ultrasound scan to estimate when your baby is due and check the physical development of your baby.
8–12	weeks	(dating	scan)
Your midwife or doctor should:
• review, discuss and record the results of any screening tests;
• measure your blood pressure and test your urine for protein;
• consider an iron supplement if you are anaemic;
• give	you	information	about	the	ultrasound	scan	you	will	b
